summary: Completed P0 bug testing for RM-ID sequence generation and sorting order fixes. All critical P0 bugs have been successfully resolved and verified through comprehensive API testing.

minor_bugs.issue: ValueError when value contains currency formatting like '$500,000'
minor_bugs.impact: Asset creation fails with formatted currency strings
minor_bugs.error_details: ValueError: could not convert string to float: '$500,000'

passed_tests: RM-ID Sequence Bug Fix - First Declaration of Trust document gets RM-ID ending in .001
RM-ID Sequence Bug Fix - Second Declaration of Trust document gets RM-ID ending in .002
RM-ID Sequence Bug Fix - First TTGD document gets RM-ID ending in .001 for its category
Documents Sorting Order - GET /api/documents returns documents sorted by created_at ascending
Assets Sorting Order - GET /api/portfolios/{id}/assets returns assets sorted by created_at ascending
Ledger Sorting Order - GET /api/portfolios/{id}/ledger returns ledger entries sorted by created_at ascending
Health Check, Root Endpoint, Knowledge Topics, Maxims, Relationships, Templates, Sources
AI Assistant Chat, Protected endpoints authentication, Auth Me, Dashboard Stats
Portfolio CRUD, Trust Profile creation, Document operations with versioning, PDF export
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Update asset creation endpoint to handle currency-formatted values (strip $ and commas before float conversion). P0 bugs are fully resolved.
